    • We cannot guarantee availability of {% if PAID_ACCOMMODATION %} accommodation, {% endif %}catering or swag for unconfirmed registrations.
    • If you have applied for an accommodation bursary, and it has been approved, you have to confirm by accepting the bursary by {{ DEBCONF_CONFIRMATION_DEADLINE|date:"SHORT_DATE_FORMAT" }} AoE.
      • {% if not PAID_ACCOMMODATION %}
    • If you haven't applied for an accommodation bursary, we won't provide any accommodation. You will have to book and pay for this yourself, directly with a Hotel. There is a list of nearby hotels.
      • {% endif %}

    • If you are paying for food {% if PAID_ACCOMMODATION %} accommodation, {% endif %} or registration you need to confirm by paying the invoice by {{ DEBCONF_CONFIRMATION_DEADLINE|date:"SHORT_DATE_FORMAT" }} AoE.
    • After these deadlines you are still able to confirm (or even register), as long as the maximum capacity hasn't been reached. You will have to organise your own food and won't get a t-shirt.

      • {% else %}
